nodes.bodyText: @rpuch can we merge this directly to PlatformDependent0 ? Seems overkill to add this class just for exposing one method etc

nodes.bodyText: I've moved the code to PlatformDependent0 and removed GraalDetector class. Please let me know if it is ok now.
